meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Miguel Ruiz Annie Douglass Sara Heard Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6129.

td.p: Miguel Ruiz, an intellectual property attorney from Glendale, California
Annie Douglass, a museum educator from Portland, Oregon
Sara Heard, a housewife from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,999)

tr.td: THANKS FOR THE MEMOIRS
SOUP & SALAD
EUROPEAN CAPITAL RHYME TIME
ANIMAL COMPANIES
FORMULA2
RACING
